Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and well priced”
Reviews.Author: DublinCityCruiser
Reviews.Content: I decided to stay at Tulip Hotel as they were offering a special rate that was far more reasonable than my usual hotel choice. The room was comfortable and spacious, the appliances all worked, and the shower had plenty of hot water. The booking was easy and the check-in was slow and disorganized, but nothing unusual for Bur Dubai hotels. Reception got my wake-up call right the first morning but then forgot to wake me the second morning. Like most hotels in Bur Dubai, the corridors are tiled and as a result, are noisy. The hotel is located on a small, quiet street, so there is very little street noise. The drawback of this is that you have to walk to a main street to find a taxi - not much fun when you are hauling luggage. So, all in all, the hotel is inexpensive and offers comfortable mid-range accommodation. They delivered exactly what they promised on their website.

Reviews.Title: “Good Deal - Great location”
Reviews.Author: Ericsosa
Reviews.Content: Live in Abu Dhabi and go to Dubai for the weekend. This hotel has a great location. We feel we got a great deal considering we have stayed at other hotels in this area and payed more for less. Our room was clean, but there was a weird smell that we did not like. I think it was the cleaning products they use. The one thing I hated was there was no free internet even in the lobby. There should be in this day and age, but we knew that when we booked. While there the staff were good though not very knowledgeable about what is around their hotel. ---*I would recommend this to my friends. * Stay at the hotel and go on a desert safari http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wGLO9SevS7s&list=UULENPQ0kK3ndzO0PssTiofA&index=7&feature=plcp We went on this trip and loved it. Have good trip.

Reviews.Title: “dirty bathroom and towels, only good location.”
Reviews.Author: habz_11
Reviews.Content: i had to clean the bathroom myself and asked housekeeping staff "polite and helpfull" to give me clean towels and bed linen... the hotel management should invest a bit more time in organizing the cleaning of the hotel, instead of sitting in the office the whole day. rude front office staff "most".

Reviews.Title: “It's only a good location, the hotel had good but dirty facilities. Rude staff”
Reviews.Author: CaTiLo
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located in Bur Dubai, very close to the main "attractions" of Dubai. It had all the facilities (kitchen, fridge, stove, cutlery, pots, tv, air conditioner,etc), but most of them were dirty (greasy, bad washed, one saucepan smelled like vomit) and we even found a dirty towel in the bathroom when we checked in (it wasn't ours). The staff doesn't bother to be polite, to say hello, to look at you when they're talking, and if you ask them for anything to be repaired (like the oven and the washing machine that weren't working) they reply almost barking. We got a room with one double bed and we needed 2 single ones, so they came to change the beds and the housekeeping guy (who was sweating and smelly), climbed on top of the clean sheets while changing them...we thought twice before using those beds. From our point of view, the hotel could be a good idea with a better management...but meanwhile, find another place to stay, there are plenty in the area

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Room Service”
Reviews.Author: sethi_sakshi
Reviews.Content: the hotel is in a very nice location of dubai but lacks a good service. the reception staff is not at all helpful & courteous and the room service was horrible. we had to wait for 2-3 hours after calling the room service for our room to get cleaned. Also we were given torn towels for 2 days contineously. Its a very nice and beautiful hotel but lacks in service.

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: rajiv_kathnep
Reviews.Content: We went there with 5 little children and all of us enjoyed to the full. Very good apartment, friendly staff, spacious, all kitchen amneties, small but good swimming pool, very good aircon, breakfast is basic. It made our stay of 7 days with children very comfortable. Highly recommend to all and would like to go again.

Reviews.Title: “Good apartment hotel”
Reviews.Author: Lindburger
Reviews.Content: Location is good. Market, shops and metrostation pretty close (5-30min walk). Staff in the hotel was nice and friendly. Good swiming pool at the roof. Good price (2 person, 1 week 2100dir (inc taxes)).

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo
Reviews.Title: “One of the best options in the hotel-apartment district”
Reviews.Author: zamb1
Reviews.Content: Extremely clean and very comfortable apartment with lovely rooftop pool and steam/sauna facilities. The staff are kind, but a little slow - I had to ask 5 times for someone to come to repair my TV. The apartments are new and not yet known to most, I drove around for ages looking for them - easiest landmark is behind 24 Spinney's on Al Mankhool Road. Sheet smelt like chlorine, and crockery etc a bit lacking, but I'm sure this place will pick up - facilities and service still much better than the nearby Golden Sands.

Reviews.Title: “best hotel for people(specially indians) going with families”
Reviews.Author: IndiaHappy81
Reviews.Content: to stay at tulip hotel apartments was a blessing in disguise. we had booking in dolphin hotel apartment but when we reach there we found that they were not able to give us the rooms though our booking was confirmed. so we were shifted to tulip hotel apartments. stay at this hotel was really excellent. staff was very helpful. there is no bar and nightclub so it is best for families going together. only thing missing was restuarent. you hardly get anything in hotel. rooms were very spacious,clean with all full kitchen facilities. taxis were arranged very quickly by the reception. overall it was really a hassle free stay. it is also very cheap as compared to other hotels.

HotelInfo.Name: Tulip Hotel Apartments
HotelInfo.Address: 5a street 317 community, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
